Trigger.Name: 白魔学者占星诗人召唤Dot
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(.+?) gains the effect of (?<dot>天辉|蛊毒法|焚灼|瘴暍|狂风蚀箭) from (?<caster>.+?) for (?<duration>\d{1,3}\.?(\d{1,2})?) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 嗜血
